CustomField.description: This shows "Customer" if the Account is a Customer Account.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Customer - Billing Paused") ), "Customer", IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Customer - LegalKEY Only"), "Future Customer", "Future Customer" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This shows "Customer" if the Account is a Customer Account.
CustomField.label: Customer Status
